Grocery store workers put their lives on the line every day to keep us fed during this pandemic. They are heroes. They deserve more than empty gestures from the corporations exploiting them—they deserve hazard pay and the protective gear they need. https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2020/08/12/grocery-workers-coronavirus/

85 years ago today Social Security was signed into law, but just last week Trump said he’ll defund Social Security if reelected. 

The choice in November is clear: we must elect @JoeBiden to strengthen and expand Social Security so our seniors can retire with dignity.

Getting back to school will require more tests with faster results. 

Researchers at @USouthFlorida are conducting a feasibility study on pool testing. This week, 100 athletes were tested & results came back in 6 hours. The goal is to eventually expand to other student groups.

After rejecting every reasonable proposal we have made it’s obvious Democrat leaders believe the more Americans suffer from the impact of the pandemic the more it helps them in November

I hope our more reasonable Dem colleagues will weigh in with Speaker Pelosi & Senator Schumer

Our democracy will remain under attack until Donald Trump is finally removed from office. We must defeat him in November. https://slate.com/business/2020/08/trump-admits-hes-blocking-usps-funding.html

Yesterday he made it clear that he wanted to destroy the U.S. Postal Service so that people couldn't cast mail-in ballots.

That ain't gonna happen.

We're going to save the Postal Service, have a huge voter turnout and defeat Trump.

The President & his cronies are trying to erode trust that our voice will be heard on election day because he fears our verdict on his failure on the coronavirus & more.

But our heroic postal workers will honor our Constitution & continue to deliver for us. #SaveThePostOffice http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1294339537041330177/pu/img/ZID5XwvJSYfgXi2F.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1294339537041330177/pu/vid/480x270/NWnJYgzVfRLCmLKd.mp4?tag=10

This is an injustice and it deserves our attention every day of the year. It's got to change.
